TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollBar extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase

summary.span: 表示提供滚动条的控件，该滚动条具有一个滑动 ，其位置对应于一个值。

span.span: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding whose position corresponds to a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了一个 控件。The following illustration shows a control. ![滚动条插图](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "ScrollBar 图")![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") 控件包含一个 控件。The control contains a control. 控件由一个 控件和两个 控件组成。The control consists of a control and two controls. 通过按 控件或移动 ，可以增加和减少 控件的 属性。You can increase and decrease the property of the control by pressing the controls or by moving the . 属性的默认值范围是从0到1。The default range of values for the property is from 0 to 1. 表示 的终结点之间的 的线性距离。The represents the linear distance of the between the endpoints of the . 可以通过设置 "" 和 "" 属性来更改值的默认范围。You can change the default range of values by setting the and properties. 属性确定 是水平显示还是垂直显示，并且必须定义此属性， 控件才能显示。The property determines whether the is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the control to appear. 中的 是面向的，以便垂直 或从左至右为水平 增加值。The in a is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical or from left to right for a horizontal . 下表中的 属性是未显式定义 属性时相应 属性的绑定目标。The properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding properties when the property is not explicitly defined. 如果显式定义 属性，则不会发生绑定。If you explicitly define the property, the binding does not occur. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 您可以使用 属性来访问 控件的 控件。You can access the control of a control by using the property. 若要在具有滚动条的框中显示 内容，请使用 控件。To display content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the control. ## 自定义滚动条控件Customizing the ScrollBar Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[滚动条样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个具有0到100之间的值范围的水平 。The following example shows how to create a horizontal that has a range of values between 0 and 100. [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#ScrollBar](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#scrollbar)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand
Public Shared ReadOnly DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand As RoutedCommand

summary.span: 通知 用户将水平 的 拖动到 中所提供值的命令。

span.span: The command that notifies the that the user is dragging the of the horizontal to the value that is provided in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户拖动 的滚动块时， 将为 调用 。When the user drags the thumb of a , the calls for the . 如果 返回 `true`，则 会执行该命令。If returns `true`, the executes that command. 如果 返回 `false`，则 执行 。If returns `false`, the executes the . 使用此命令来启用延迟滚动。The uses this command to enable deferred scrolling. 当 `true` 并且用户拖动 的 时， 的内容在用户释放 之前不会发生更改。When is `true` and a user drags the of the , the content of the does not change until the user releases the . 如果启用了延迟滚动，则当用户拖动 时， 将为水平 执行 。If deferred scrolling is enabled, the executes the for a horizontal when the user drags the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand
Public Shared ReadOnly DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand As RoutedCommand

summary.span: 通知 用户将垂直 的 拖动到 中所提供值的命令。

span.span: The command that notifies the that the user is dragging the of the vertical to the value that is provided in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户拖动 的滚动块时， 将为 调用 。When the user drags the thumb of a , the calls for the . 如果 返回 `true`，则 会执行该命令。If returns `true`, the executes that command. 如果 返回 `false`，则 执行 。If returns `false`, the executes the . 使用此命令来启用延迟滚动。The uses this command to enable deferred scrolling. 当 `true` 并且用户拖动 的 时， 的内容在用户释放 之前不会发生更改。When is `true` and a user drags the of the , the content of the does not change until the user releases the . 如果启用了延迟滚动，则当用户拖动 时， 将为垂直 执行 。If deferred scrolling is enabled, the executes the for a vertical when the user drags the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件通常在用户通过拖动 更改 的 时出现多次。This event typically occurs multiple times when the user changes the of the by dragging the . 拖动 位置时，引发此事件的次数没有限制。There is no limit to the number of times this event is raised as the position is dragged. 当在代码中更改 控件的 时，不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when the of the control is changed in code. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 事件的事件处理程序分配给 控件，以及如何在代码中定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler in code. summary.span: 获取 控件的 。

span.span: Gets the for a control.

value.span: 与 控件一起使用的 。

span.span: The that is used with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的典型样式模板包括一个 控件，该控件括在两个 控件的两侧。A typical style template for a control includes a control that is surrounded on either side by two controls. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问与 控件一起使用的 控件。The following example shows how to access the control that is used with a control. [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#Track](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#track)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#Track](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#track)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ViewportSize { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ViewportSize : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前可见的可滚动内容的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.

value.span: 当前可见的可滚动内容的量。

span.span: The amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 的单位是用于描述内容长度的相同单位。The units that are used for are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content. 一些示例包括文本行或文本页。Some examples include lines of text or pages of text. 属性的值用于计算在 控件中显示为滑动值指示器的 控件的大小。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a control. 控件的大小表示显示的 控件内容的量。The control's size represents the amount of a control's content that is visible. 如果有25% 的 控件的内容可见，则 会在 占据轨迹的25%。If 25 percent of a control's content is visible, the occupies 25 percent of the track in the . 您可以决定 使用的单位。You can decide which units uses. 设置此属性时，请确保 、、和 属性使用相同的单位。When you set this property, make sure that the , , , and properties use the same units. 下图显示了 大小如何反映可见内容的数量。The following illustration shows how the size reflects the amount of content that is visible. ![滚动条的轨道长度和 scrollbar](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "ScrollBar 的跟踪长度和滚动块大小")![The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 控件上设置 。The following example shows how to set the on a control. [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#viewport)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#viewport)] [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#viewport)]
